author: Shayndi Raice
title: Why One Trump County Rejected an Immigration-Detention Facility
text:
GOSHEN, Ind.â€”Private-prison company CoreCivic met in January with about 20 local business leaders and elected officials to discuss its plan to build a $100 million immigration-detention facility in Elkhart County.
The response? An overwhelming thumbs-down.
The business executives, many in the RV industry, worried about the signal that would...
